Looper¶

class looper.Looper[source]¶

Parent class to set up looping threads/processes

on_pend()[source]¶

Runs once after the process loop

on_ploop()[source]¶

Runs on each loop of the process

Raises:
NotImplementedError: if the derivative class does not implement this function and is running a process loop
on_pstart()[source]¶

Runs once before the process loop

on_tend()[source]¶

Runs once after the thread loop

on_tloop()[source]¶

Runs on each loop of the thread

Raises:
NotImplementedError: if the derivative class does not implement this function and is running a thread loop
on_tstart()[source]¶

Runs once before the thread loop

ploop(pipe)[source]¶

Runs the process loop

pstart()[source]¶

Starts a looping process

set_loop_time(loop_time)[source]¶

Sets the minimum time for a loop

Args:
loop_time (float): minimum time in seconds for each loop
stop()[source]¶

Stops the thread or process

tloop()[source]¶

Runs the thread loop

tstart()[source]¶

Starts a looping thread
